page.title: 07LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: EMPLOYMENT:Most people in Cawthorne and Silkstone travel to work by car to Barnsley,Sheffield,and even further away.Many are business or professional people.The biggest local employers in Cawthorne are Naylors Pipe Works and Cannon Hall Estates.There is hardly any unemployment in the two villages.There are more people out of work in Barugh Green.Some people there are miners or work in Barnsley. FEARN'S TRANSPORT:Founded in 1925,now split into Fearn's Haulage and Fearn's Tankers.Haulage firm employs 14 men and uses 16 trailers and 2 triaxles.They carry wire mesh and bricks as thier main cargoes. Fearn's Tankers have recently been taken over and carry mainly cargoes of corrosive phenolic acids for coal distillation plants.
